participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative and thoughtful, Lila enjoys expressing herself through her art and finds joy in the little things in life.
participant_1.background: I want a home with a big yard for my dogs to run and play in. I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life. i do not know if i enjoy programming , or if its my only choice. I have been learning more about the business through my parents and have been taking on more responsibilities. i never sleep in.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and dedicated, Ethan is eager to learn and grow in his career while balancing family responsibilities.
participant_2.background: I love that my job allows me to work from home so I can be there for my mother when she needs me. I'm relatively new to the workforce, but I've been at my current job for a few months now. this season , i will become a playoff quarterback. my favorite meal is chicken and rice. I once told a cop that my car was sentient and it was driving itself.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Hey! My day is going great! I just got back from working from home.
That's awesome! What do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer. It's a pretty new job for me, but I'm really enjoying it so far.
That's cool! I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
Pottery sounds really fun! I've never tried it before.
It's a lot of fun! And it's very relaxing.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm always looking for new things to try.
Well, if you're ever in the mood to learn more about pottery, I'd be happy to show you what I know.
That sounds like a great offer! I'll definitely take you up on that sometime.
Awesome! I can't wait to show you what I do.
